all_cars_are_checked.title: All Cars Are Checked
all_cars_are_checked.body: We check history and technical conditions on all used cars to offer only the best

one_year_warranty.title: 1 Year Warranty
one_year_warranty.body: All cars in Carfest have 1 year warranty on engine, gearbox and drive shaft

fully_functional_cars.title: Fully Functional Cars
fully_functional_cars.body: We restore every little damage on every used car until they are fully functional and like new

beast_leasing_offers.title: Best Leasing Offers
beast_leasing_offers.body: We cooperate with several leasing companies. This gives us and opportunity to offer best leasing terms on market
